posts.post_content:
Posted By: Aaron Cowan
Very simple...just looking for a T205 Bob Harmon (not the SP card).  Something in the VG range would do just fine.  Don't care about the back, I just want to avoid creases.  I also prefer it to be raw but would be fine with a graded card as well.  Just send me email if anyone is interested in parting with there Harmon card.  Thanks!



Aaron Cowan - acowan19@gmail.com
[url]http://s134.photobucket.com/albums/q102/acowan19/[/url]
